title: Should cho'gath get nerfed?
body: Cho'gath always seems to be banned in my games and its for a good reason. Cho'gath is always good in early game, mid game and especially late game and his ult does tons of damage, it doesn't matter if he builds ap or tank. I don't see a better tank to pick in games other than cho'gath, he has the damage, the cc and the tank, which is why I think he should be changed in some way so that he doesn't dominate too much.

his sustain should get nerfed, Not by much but atm, he just sits in lane chucing W's and Q's out Ulting every 25 seconds and getting feast stacks....

He has to have some laneing weakness since they buffed his ult cd.

I'm a little biased because he is my main top laner and i will agree he is good, however he is very vulnerable to ranged harass and ganks, as he has no mobility options of his own and hard to land skillshots being his only CC. great for dragon/baron control because og his ult which does more damage than smite, but put him vs a gnar and he will sh*t himself

Although I agree that he is vulnerable to ranged harass, I think that once he lands a rupture, there is almost no way to come out because of the slow. I think it should be changed so that instead of a knockup slow, it should be a knock up mini-stun just like alistar's q.
